(a)    how many youth groups and individuals from Lumezi Parliamentary Constituency were funded under the Youth Empowerment Fund from 2012 to-date, year by year;
(b)    on what projects the funds were invested; and
(c)    if no one from the Constituency benefitted, what measures the Government is taking to empower the youths in the Constituency. W6    Mr Namulambe (Mpongwe) - to ask the Vice President:
(a)    what tangible benefits have been realised from the amalgamation of some Government Ministries from October, 2011 to date, in terms of the following:
(i)    cost savings; and (ii)    effective service delivery.
(b)    if no tangible benefits have been realised, whether there are plans to separate the affected Ministries; and

(c)    if so, when the plans will be implemented. PRESENTATION OF GOVERNMENT BILL The Minister of Labour and Social Security The Employment (Amendment) - Bill to amend the Employment Act.
